archimate:Goal.name: Goal
archimate:Goal.documentation:
The five whys, ask why five times. What you are trying to acheive to acheive the outcome
Catalog of all public sector data --why? (1)--> overview of all public sector data --why? (2)--> one common source of searching for data from all agencies --why (3)--> ability to reuse data accross public sector --why (4)--> not ask the user more than once
